edu.umd.cloud9.collection
Class XMLInputFormatOld

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.mapred.FileInputFormat<LongWritable,Text>
      org.apache.hadoop.mapred.TextInputFormat
          edu.umd.cloud9.collection.XMLInputFormatOld
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputFormat<LongWritable,Text>, JobConfigurable
public class XMLInputFormatOld
extends TextInputFormat

A simple InputFormat for XML documents (org.apache.hadoop.mapred API). The class recognizes begin-of-document and end-of-document tags only: everything between those delimiting tags is returned in an uninterpreted Text object.

Author:
Jimmy Lin
